WorkItem.Description:
In PHP earlier than 5.2.11, using Excel2007 reader to load a .xlsx file will just die and showing no error.

It cause by @libxml_disable_entity_loader() in PHPExcel_Settings::setLibXmlLoaderOptions and PHPExcel_Settings::getLibXmlLoaderOptions which is only available in  PHP >= 5.2.11
WorkItem.Summary: Not loading .xlsx in PHP earlier than 5.2.11
